title: Cappex
author: Cappex
content: Hello community, I'm pretty sure you've heard of Soulbound technology so I'll be quick!The Phala Network team, parachain on Kusama and Polkadot with a cloud computing powered by 16,000 miners and 135,000 vCPUs, has created this technology that can link your web3 and web2 experience and contributions into a unique identity called DID in the form of NFT, your features will be unique and you will be able to join a new gaming experience thanks to the new upcoming metaverse called PHALA WORLD.Here is the link to the documentation, you will find all the information you need to understand and explore this interesting approach: https://docs.phala.world/The discord community is waiting for you: https://discord.gg/phalaworldGet to know PhalaWorld
